availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Eli D. Drennan (Caldwell County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. South Carolina native. Married to Margaret "Peggy" McDowell Drennan in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on November 14, 1825. Father of Lucinda Drennan, Alfred J. Drennan, Elizabeth A. Drennan, Eli W. Drennan, Rachel L. Drennan, Mary F. Drennan, and Ailey Ellen Drennan. Married to Mary Drennan. Farmer in Caldwell County, in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 323B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 39.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, 1786-1878, Film #000851644.
